message: Let's start with this. A fair deal considering the inflation will affect you more than me.
I understand the inflation disparity, but your initial offer was too low. This is a more balanced proposal.
The inflation is eating away at our potential gains, especially yours Bob.  I'm willing to be fair, but I need you to meet me closer in the middle.
Alice, we're getting dangerously close to losing a significant chunk of this money. I'm holding firm at 40 to reflect the inflation difference, but this offer won't be on the table much longer.
